import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col,Image, ListGroup,Card, Button, ListGroupItem,FormControl} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios' const ProductScreen = () => { const params = useParams() const id = params.id const [qty,setQty] = useState(0) const [product,setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async ()=> { const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/products/${params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() },[]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ₹ {product.Price} Description: {product.description} Price: ₹ {product.Price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In stock' : 'Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty {setQty(e.target.value)}}> { [...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( )) } )} ) } export default ProductScreen
